name: Nuclear Bad Day
description:
Did you ever wish to work in a nuclear power plant? Who doesn't? lucky you, we can make this dream come true! Pick up your white lab coat and come with us! You don't know how to make it work? Just follow the instructions on the post-it notes, it's easy as ABC you just have to keep it alive!

Nuclear Bad Day is a Point and Click Game, you are managing a nuclear power plant that has some technical issues. Use your scientists to fix the machines and cool down the reactor.

This game was created by a team of 5 . We hope you enjoyed playing our game, it was a lot of fun making it.
